languages.text: {n}Хладные торговцы с непроницаемыми лицами сверлят взглядами Пощаду. Похоже, сейчас они способны внимать лишь одному голосу.{/n}
{n}The Cold Traders stare at Mercy, their faces giving nothing away. It seems they have ears for only one voice now.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хладные торговцы с непроницаемыми лицами сверлят взглядами Пощаду. Похоже, сейчас они способны внимать лишь одному голосу.{/n}

{n}The Cold Traders stare at Mercy, their faces giving nothing away. It seems they have ears for only one voice now.{/n}

languages.text: {n}冷市商人们盯着悯慈，脸上没有任何表情。他们似乎只能听得到他一个人的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders stare at Mercy, their faces giving nothing away. It seems they have ears for only one voice now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冷市商人们盯着悯慈，脸上没有任何表情。他们似乎只能听得到他一个人的声音。{/n}

languages.text: {n}コールド・トレーダーたちはマーシーを見つめるが、その表情からは何も伝わってこない。彼らは今、ただひとつの声に耳を傾けているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders stare at Mercy, their faces giving nothing away. It seems they have ears for only one voice now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コールド・トレーダーたちはマーシーを見つめるが、その表情からは何も伝わってこない。彼らは今、ただひとつの声に耳を傾けているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Comerciantes Fríos miran a Mercy sin dejar que sus expresiones delaten nada. Parece que ahora mismo solo escuchan una voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders stare at Mercy, their faces giving nothing away. It seems they have ears for only one voice now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Comerciantes Fríos miran a Mercy sin dejar que sus expresiones delaten nada. Parece que ahora mismo solo escuchan una voz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les marchands dans l'assemblée regardent fixement Mercy, le visage impassible. Ils semblent ne plus entendre qu'une seule voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders stare at Mercy, their faces giving nothing away. It seems they have ears for only one voice now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les marchands dans l'assemblée regardent fixement Mercy, le visage impassible. Ils semblent ne plus entendre qu'une seule voix.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kalthändler starren Mercy an, ihre Gesichter lassen nichts blicken. Es scheint, als hätten sie nur Ohren für eine Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders stare at Mercy, their faces giving nothing away. It seems they have ears for only one voice now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kalthändler starren Mercy an, ihre Gesichter lassen nichts blicken. Es scheint, als hätten sie nur Ohren für eine Stimme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüz ifadeleri hiçbir şey açık etmeyen Soğuk Tacirler, Merhamet'e bakıyor. Kulakları yalnızca onun dediklerini duyuyor gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders stare at Mercy, their faces giving nothing away. It seems they have ears for only one voice now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüz ifadeleri hiçbir şey açık etmeyen Soğuk Tacirler, Merhamet'e bakıyor. Kulaklarını yalnızca tek bir sese açmış gibiler.{/n}
